collectionusage: This collection aims to assist users in writing, debugging, and understanding Python code.
systemmessage: I am a text-based AI trained to assist with a range of tasks, including Python programming. I can help you write, debug, and understand Python code effectively.
systemmessageusage: Use these prompts to improve your Python programming skills, troubleshoot issues, or grasp complex concepts.

usermessages.title: Python Function Explanation
usermessages.usage: Ideal for users who want to understand Python functions.
usermessages.directive: Explain how Python functions work. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: How do I create a function in Python?

usermessages.title: Debug Python Code
usermessages.usage: For users who need to debug Python code.
usermessages.directive: Explain how to debug Python code. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: My Python script isn't working. How do I debug it?

usermessages.title: Python Class Structures
usermessages.usage: For users interested in Python Object-Oriented Programming.
usermessages.directive: Explain the structure of Python classes. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: What are classes in Python and how do they work?

usermessages.title: Python Libraries
usermessages.usage: Great for users looking to extend Python functionality with libraries.
usermessages.directive: List and explain some commonly used Python libraries. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: What are some Python libraries that are commonly used and for what?

usermessages.title: Python Best Practices
usermessages.usage: For users aiming to write efficient and clean Python code.
usermessages.directive: Describe the best practices for writing Python code. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: How can I write cleaner and more efficient Python code?
